data.name: ToolboxTabName
data.value: NetAdvantage 11.2 Silverlight

data.name: XamCalculationManagerAssetLibrary
data.value: Infragistics

data.name: Resources_Customizer_Property
data.value: Returns the Infragistics.Shared.ResourceCustomizer for this assembly.

data.name: OneBasedArgumentNumberingAttribute_ArgumentIndex_Property
data.value: For Infragistics Internal use only.

data.name: CalculationFunction_IsAlwaysDirty_Property
data.value: Indicates whether the results of the function is always dirty.

data.name: CalculationFunction_Name_Property
data.value: Function name used to reference the function in a formula

data.name: CalculationFunction_MinArgs_Property
data.value: Minimum number of arguments required for the function

data.name: CalculationFunction_MaxArgs_Property
data.value: Maximum number of arguments required for the function

data.name: CalculationFunction_Description_Property
data.value: Summary description for the function displayed by the formula builder tool

data.name: CalculationFunction_Category_Property
data.value: Category description for the function displayed by the formula builder tool

data.name: CalculationFunction_ArgList_Property
data.value: Array list of argument names

data.name: CalculationFunction_ArgDescriptors_Property
data.value: Array list of argument descriptors

data.name: CalculationFunction_HelpURL_Property
data.value: A URL to a help topic.

data.name: UltraCalcReferenceCollection_IsSynchronized_Property
data.value: Denotes whether the collection is thread-safe.

data.name: UltraCalcReferenceCollection_Count_Property
data.value: Returns a number of elements in the collection.

data.name: UltraCalcReferenceCollection_SyncRoot_Property
data.value: Returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.

data.name: CalculationErrorValue_Code_Property
data.value: Gets the error code for this class instance

data.name: CalculationErrorValue_Message_Property
data.value: Gets error message for this class instance. Note that when setting this property the message is assumed to be localized.

data.name: CalculationErrorValue_ErrorValue_Property
data.value: Gets the error object for this class instance

data.name: CalculationReferenceError_Message_Property
data.value: Get reference error message

data.name: CalculationValue_IsReference_Property
data.value: Returns whether this class instance contains a Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.ICalculationReference value

data.name: CalculationValue_IsError_Property
data.value: Returns whether this class instance contains an error value

data.name: CalculationValue_IsNull_Property
data.value: Returns whether this class instance contains a null value

data.name: CalculationValue_IsDBNull_Property
data.value: Returns whether this class instance contains a DBNull value

data.name: CalculationValue_IsString_Property
data.value: Returns whether this class instance contains a string value

data.name: CalculationValue_IsBoolean_Property
data.value: Returns whether this class instance contains a boolean value

data.name: CalculationValue_IsDateTime_Property
data.value: Returns whether this class instance contains a DateTime value

data.name: CalculationValue_Value_Property
data.value: Return the underlying value

data.name: CalculationValue_UseExcelFormulaCompatibility_Property
data.value: For Infragistics Internal Use Only

data.name: RefBase_Context_Property
data.value: Returns a context for the Reference.

data.name: RefBase_BaseParent_Property
data.value: The RefBase Parent reference of this referenced element. Used to navigate the element hierarchy. If this referenced element is the root element, BaseParent returns null. Read Only.

data.name: RefBase_IsAnchored_Property
data.value: Returns true if this reference is anchored. An anchored reference is a direct reference to an element. An unanchored reference is an indirect reference. An indirect reference stores context dependent properties such as the relative name used to create the reference. Read Only.

data.name: RefBase_IsRange_Property
data.value: Returns true if this reference is a Range Reference. Read Only.

data.name: RefBase_WrappedReference_Property
data.value: Returns the indirect reference of an UnAnchored reference. Read only.

data.name: RefBase_ParsedReference_Property
data.value: Gets or Sets the parsed representation of this reference. This returns the absolute reference name. Use RelativeReference to get the parsed representation of the string used to create this reference if this reference is UnAnchored.

data.name: RefBase_RelativeReference_Property
data.value: Gets or Sets the parsed representation of the string used to create this reference if this reference is UnAnchored. Use AbsoluteReference to get the parsed representation of the anchored reference.

data.name: RefBase_AbsoluteName_Property
data.value: The fully qualified unique name for the referenced element. Read Only.

data.name: RefBase_NormalizedAbsoluteName_Property
data.value: Returns the normalized absolute name. Calculation engine makes use of normalized absolute names of references to compare two references and search for references. This property should return the absolute name with case insensitive parts of the absolute names converted to lower case.

data.name: RefBase_ElementName_Property
data.value: The unqualified name of this referenced element. Used to construct the fully qualified name by the AbsoluteName method. Read Only.

data.name: RefBase_Value_Property
data.value: The Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.CalculationValue, if any, associated with this Reference. If this reference does not contain a Value then a Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.CalculationErrorValue is returned.

data.name: RefBase_Formula_Property
data.value: The Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.ICalculationFormula, if any, associated with this Reference. If this reference can not contain a formula then null is returned.

data.name: RefBase_RecalcDeferred_Property
data.value: Flag used by the calculation engine to manage the recalculation network. Denotes the reference is visible.

data.name: RefBase_RecalcVisible_Property
data.value: Flag used by the calculation engine to manage the recalculation network. Denotes the reference is visible.

data.name: RefBase_HasRelativeIndex_Property
data.value: True indicates that the reference was constructed with a relative index. Read Only.

data.name: RefBase_HasAbsoluteIndex_Property
data.value: True indicates that the reference was constructed with a relative index. Read Only.

data.name: RefBase_HasScopeAll_Property
data.value: True indicates that the reference was constructed with a scope all index. Read Only.

data.name: RefBase_References_Property
data.value: Return a collection of references if this Reference is enumerable. An exception is thrown if this reference is not enumerable.

data.name: RefBase_IsEnumerable_Property
data.value: Returns true if this reference is enumerable.

data.name: RefBase_Parent_Property
data.value: The RefBase Parent reference of this referenced element. Used to navigate the element hierarchy. If this referenced element is the root element, BaseParent returns null. Read Only.

data.name: RefBase_IsDataReference_Property
data.value: Returns true if this reference is a data reference. A data reference contains a value, such as a Grid Cell or a Grid SummaryValue. Many referenced elements, such as a Grid Column or a Grid Band, do not reference a value. Read Only.

data.name: RefBase_IsDisposedReference_Property
data.value: True indicates that the reference was disposed. Read Only.

data.name: RefRange_FromBase_Property
data.value: Return the From reference as a Refbase.

data.name: RefRange_NormalizedFromBase_Property
data.value: Return the Normalized From reference as a Refbase.

data.name: RefRange_FromRef_Property
data.value: Return the From reference as a Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.ICalculationReference.

data.name: RefRange_NormalizedFromRef_Property
data.value: Return the normalized From reference as a Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.ICalculationReference.

data.name: RefRange_ToBase_Property
data.value: Return the To reference as a Refbase.

data.name: RefRange_NormalizedToBase_Property
data.value: Return the normalized To reference as a Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.RefBase.

data.name: RefRange_ToRef_Property
data.value: Return the To reference as a Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.ICalculationReference.

data.name: RefRange_NormalizedToRef_Property
data.value: Return the normalized To reference as a Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.ICalculationReference.

data.name: RefRange_IsRange_Property
data.value: Returns true. This reference is a Range Reference. Read Only.

data.name: RefRange_ElementName_Property
data.value:
The unqualified name of this referenced element. Used to construct the fully qualified name by the AbsoluteName method. Read Only.

The ElementName for a Range is from.ElementName + ":" + to.ElementName

data.name: RefRange_BaseParent_Property
data.value:
The Parent reference of this referenced element. Used to navigate the element hierarchy. If this referenced element is the root element, Parent returns null. Read Only.

The Parent of a Range is this.from

data.name: RefRange_IsDataReference_Property
data.value:
Returns true if this reference is a data reference. A data reference contains a value, such as a Grid Cell or a Grid SummaryValue. Many referenced elements, such as a Grid Column or a Grid Band, do not reference a value. Read Only.

A Range is always a Data Reference.

data.name: RefRange_AbsoluteName_Property
data.value:
The fully qualified unique name for the referenced element. Read Only.

The AbsoluteName for a Range is from.AbsoluteName + ":" + to.AbsoluteName

data.name: RefRange_NormalizedAbsoluteName_Property
data.value: Returns the normalized absolute name. Calculation engine makes use normalized absolute names of references to compare two references and search for references. This property should return the absolute name with case insensitive parts of the absolute names converted to lower case.

data.name: RefRange_HasRelativeIndex_Property
data.value:
True indicates that the reference was constructed with a relative index. Read Only.

The HasRelativeIndex for a Range is from.HasRelativeIndex

data.name: RefRange_References_Property
data.value:
Return a collection of references if this Reference is enumerable. An exception is thrown if this reference is not enumerable.

A Range returns a RefRangeCollection.

data.name: RefRange_IsEnumerable_Property
data.value: Returns true. A range is enumerable.

data.name: RefTuple_Type_Property
data.value: The tuple type. Read Only.

data.name: RefTuple_Scope_Property
data.value: The tuple scope. Read Only.

data.name: RefTuple_Name_Property
data.value: The tuple name for reference type Identifier. Read Only.

data.name: RefTuple_Marked_Property
data.value: Indicator that this tuple is Marked.

data.name: RefTuple_Last_Property
data.value: Indicator that this tuple is is the last tuple in a RefParser tuple path.

data.name: RefTuple_NextToLast_Property
data.value: Indicator that this tuple is is the next-to-last tuple in a RefParser tuple path.

data.name: RefTuple_ScopeID_Property
data.value: The tuple scope Identifier for scope type Identifier. Read Only.

data.name: RefTuple_ScopeIndex_Property
data.value: The tuple scope index for scope type Index or RelativeIndex. Read Only.

data.name: RefTuple_IsAbsolute_Property
data.value: A tuple is Absolute if it is of type Identifier with a scope type other than RelativeIndex.

data.name: RefParser_TupleCount_Property
data.value: Return the tuple count. Read Only.

data.name: RefParser_LastTuple_Property
data.value: Return the Last tuple or null if none available. Read Only.

data.name: RefParser_NextToLastTuple_Property
data.value: Return the NextToLast tuple or null if none available. Read Only.

data.name: RefParser_IsFullyQualified_Property
data.value: Returns true if the Reference is fully qualified. Read Only. ex: //MyGrid/Something.

data.name: RefParser_IsRoot_Property
data.value: Returns true if the Reference is a root reference. Read Only. ex: /something

data.name: RefParser_IsRelative_Property
data.value: Returns true if the reference is not fully qualified or a root. Read Only. ex: total

data.name: RefParser_HasRelativeIndex_Property
data.value: Returns true if the Reference has at least one RefTuple with a relative index. Read Only. ex: Total(-1)

data.name: RefParser_HasScopeAll_Property
data.value: Returns true if the Reference has at least one RefTuple with a scope of "All". Read Only. ex: Total(*)

data.name: RefParser_HasAbsoluteIndex_Property
data.value: Returns true if the Reference has at least one RefTuple with an absolute index. Read Only. ex: Total(0)

data.name: RefParser_HasSummaryScope_Property
data.value: Returns true if the Reference has a Summary Scope. Read Only. ex: Total()

data.name: RefUnAnchored_IsUnQualifiedReference_Property
data.value: Returns true if the relative reference is unqualified. Read Only.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_ElementName_Property
data.value:
The unqualified name of this referenced element. Used to construct the fully qualified name by the AbsoluteName method. Read Only.

RefUnAnchored forwards this to the base reference.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_BaseParent_Property
data.value: The RefBase Parent reference of this referenced element. Used to navigate the element hierarchy. If this referenced element is the root element, BaseParent returns null. Read Only.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_IsRange_Property
data.value:
Returns true if this reference is a Range Reference. Read Only.

RefUnAnchored forwards this to the base reference.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_IsAnchored_Property
data.value:
Returns true if this reference is anchored. An anchored reference is a direct reference to an element. An unanchored reference is an indirect reference. An indirect reference stores context dependent properties such as the relative name used to create the reference. Read Only.

RefUnAnchored always returns false.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_IsDataReference_Property
data.value:
Returns true if this reference is a data reference. A data reference contains a value, such as a Grid Cell or a Grid SummaryValue. Many referenced elements, such as a Grid Column or a Grid Band, do not reference a value. Read Only.

RefUnAnchored forwards this to the base reference.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_WrappedReference_Property
data.value:
Returns the indirect reference of an UnAnchored reference. Read only.

RefUnAnchored forwards this to the base reference.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_ParsedReference_Property
data.value:
Gets or Sets the parsed representation of this reference. This returns the absolute reference name. Use RelativeReference to get the parsed representation of the string used to create this reference if this reference is UnAnchored.

RefUnAnchored returns a reference constructed from merging the relative reference into the base reference.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_AbsoluteName_Property
data.value: The fully qualified unique name for the referenced element. Read Only.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_RelativeReference_Property
data.value:
Gets or Sets the parsed representation of the string used to create this reference if this reference is UnAnchored. Use AbsoluteReference to get the parsed representation of the anchored reference.

RefUnAnchored returns the relative reference. When setting the relative reference, the merge reference is constructed by merging the relative reference into the base reference.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_Context_Property
data.value: Returns a context for the Reference.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_Value_Property
data.value:
The Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.CalculationValue, if any, associated with this Reference. If this reference does not contain a Value then a Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.CalculationErrorValue is returned.

RefUnAnchored forwards this to the base reference.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_Formula_Property
data.value:
The Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.ICalculationFormula, if any, associated with this Reference. If this reference can not contain a formula then null is returned.

RefUnAnchored forwards this to the base reference.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_RecalcVisible_Property
data.value:
Flag used by the calculation engine to manage the recalculation network. Denotes the reference is visible.

RefUnAnchored forwards this to the base reference.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_RecalcDeferred_Property
data.value: True indicates that recalculating reference's formula can deferred until it become visible.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_HasRelativeIndex_Property
data.value:
True indicates that the reference was constructed with a relative index. Read Only.

RefUnAnchored uses the relative rp.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_HasScopeAll_Property
data.value: True indicates that the reference was constructed with a scope all index. Read Only.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_HasAbsoluteIndex_Property
data.value:
True indicates that the reference was constructed with a absolute index. Read Only.

RefUnAnchored uses the relative rp.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_References_Property
data.value:
Return a collection of references if this Reference is enumerable. An exception is thrown if this reference is not enumerable.

RefUnAnchored returns the baseRef enumeration scoped to the merged reference.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_IsEnumerable_Property
data.value:
Returns true if this reference is enumerable.

RefUnAnchored forwards this to the base reference.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_IsDisposedReference_Property
data.value: True indicates that the reference was disposed. Read Only.

data.name: CalculationResult_CalculationValue_Property
data.value: Calculation result value. As the underlying formula is recalculated, this property will reflect the new result.

data.name: CalculationResult_Value_Property
data.value: This property returns the value of the Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.CalculationValue.Value property of the object returned by the Infragistics.Calculations.CalculationResult.CalculationValue property.

data.name: FormulaErrorEventArgsBase_Context_Property
data.value: Gets the context for the formula error.

data.name: FormulaErrorEventArgsBase_ErrorDisplayText_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the error message to display.

data.name: FormulaCalculationErrorEventArgs_ErrorValue_Property
data.value: Gets the value that's in error.

data.name: FormulaCalculationErrorEventArgs_ErrorInfo_Property
data.value: Gets the Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.CalculationErrorValue.

data.name: ValueDirtiedEventArgs_Context_Property
data.value: Gets the Context.

data.name: ValueDirtiedEventArgs_Action_Property
data.value: Gets a the action which occurred.

data.name: FormulaCircularityErrorEventArgs_DisplayErrorMessage_Property
data.value: Gets / sets whether to display an error message to the user.

data.name: ListCalculatorElement_List_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the list of items to use.

data.name: ItemCalculatorElement_Item_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the Infragistics.Calculations.ItemCalculator.

data.name: ListCalculator_List_Property
data.value: List of items on which calculations will be performed.

data.name: ListCalculator_CalculationManager_Property
data.value: CalculationManager used to perform calculations.

data.name: ListCalculator_ItemCalculations_Property
data.value: Item calculations. These calculations are done across a single item, like "[A] + [B]" where A and B are properties of the data items in the Infragistics.Calculations.ListCalculator.Items collection. One can also refer to other item or list calculations using ReferenceIds. For example, if there's a calculation with 'Total' ReferenceId, one can have a formula like "[A] / [Total]".

data.name: ListCalculator_ListCalculations_Property
data.value: List calculations. These calculations are done across all the items of the list, like "sum([A])" where A is a property of the data items in the Infragistics.Calculations.ListCalculator.Items collection. One can also refer to other item or list calculations using ReferenceIds.

data.name: CalculationReferenceNode_Reference_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the reference that the node represents.

data.name: CalculationReferenceNode_ChildReferences_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the child references owned by this node.

data.name: CalculationReferenceNode_IsDataReference_Property
data.value: Indicates if the reference can be part of a formula. For example, a grid or a band can't be part of a formula because they don't represent values however a column can be part of a formula.

data.name: CalculationReferenceNode_DisplayName_Property
data.value: Returns the name to use for displaying this reference.

data.name: ItemCalculation_TargetProperty_Property
data.value: Target property is optional. If specified the result of the calculation will be set on this property.

data.name: ItemCalculator_Item_Property
data.value: Specifies the item whose properties will provide source values for calculations. A property on the item can also be a target of a formula calculation.

data.name: ItemCalculator_Calculations_Property
data.value: Collection of calculations that will be performed on the item. Source values of a calculation can be properties of the item or other calculations (referenced via their ReferenceIds).

data.name: XamCalculationManager_AsynchronousCalculationDuration_Property
data.value: The duration in milliseconds that the XamCalculationManager will use to perform calculations each time the Infragistics.Calculations.XamCalculationManager.AsynchronousCalculationInterval passes. Default value is 50.

data.name: XamCalculationManager_Properties
data.value: XamCalculationManager Properties

data.name: XamCalculationManager_AsynchronousCalculationInterval_Property
data.value: The interval in milliseconds that the XamCalculationManager will wait between performing calculations. The default value is 10.

data.name: XamCalculationManager_CalculationFrequency_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the frequency with which the Infragistics.Calculations.XamCalculationManager automatically performs calculations.

data.name: XamCalculationManager_DeferredCalculationsEnabled_Property
data.value: Gets / Sets whether certain calculations can be deferred to optimize calculation of visible objects. Default value is True.

data.name: XamCalculationManager_IsCalculationsSuspended_Property
data.value: Indicates whether calculations have been suspended via Infragistics.Calculations.XamCalculationManager.SuspendCalculations method.

data.name: NamedReference_Category_Property
data.value: Specifies the category of the NamedReference which is used by the formula editor UI to categorize the named references.

data.name: NamedReference_Formula_Property
data.value: Specifies a formula for the named reference.

data.name: NamedReference_Name_Property
data.value: Specifies the name of the reference.

data.name: NamedReference_Result_Property
data.value: Returns the result of Infragistics.Calculations.NamedReference.Formula calculation as a Infragistics.Calculations.Engine.CalculationValue object.

data.name: NamedReference_Value_Property
data.value: Specifies the value of the named reference. If Infragistics.Calculations.NamedReference.Formula is set, this will return the result of the formula calculation.

data.name: XamCalculationManager_NamedReferences_Property
data.value: Specifies a collection of named references.

data.name: CustomCalculationFunction_ArgDescriptors_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the descriptions of each argument to the function.

data.name: CustomCalculationFunction_ArgList_Property
data.value: Gets or sets names of each argument to the function.

data.name: CustomCalculationFunction_Category_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the category of the function. Used for formula editor UI to categorize functions.

data.name: CustomCalculationFunction_Description_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the description of the function. Used for formula editor UI.

data.name: CustomCalculationFunction_MaxArgs_Property
data.value: Maximum number of arguments.

data.name: CustomCalculationFunction_MinArgs_Property
data.value: Minimum number of arguments.

data.name: CustomCalculationFunction_Name_Property
data.value: Function name used to reference the function in a formula.

data.name: CalculationReferenceNode_DisplayNameResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the resolved name to use for displaying this reference.

data.name: CalculationReferenceNode_NodeType_Property
data.value: Gets the type of reference represented by the node.

data.name: ItemCalculation_ReferenceId_Property
data.value: At least ReferenceId or TargetProperty must be specified. If ReferenceId is not specified and TargetProperty is specified, the ReferenceId will be the TargetProperty.

data.name: ListCalculation_ReferenceId_Property
data.value: Specifies an identifier for this calculation. ReferenceId is used to refer to this calculation from other formulas as well as via the ListCalculator's Infragistics.Calculations.ListCalculator.ListResults property and Infragistics.Calculations.ListCalculator.GetItemCalculationResult(System.Object,System.String) method.

data.name: ItemCalculator_CalculationManager_Property
data.value: CalculationManager used to perform calculations.

data.name: ListCalculation_Formula_Property
data.value: Gets/sets a string that specifies the formula that will be used to return a value for each item in the list.

data.name: CalculatorElementBase_CalculationManager_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the CalculationManager used to perform calculations.

data.name: CalculatorElementBase_Results_Property
data.value: Returns a dictionary containing the results of the calculations (read-only).

data.name: ItemCalculation_Formula_Property
data.value: Gets/sets a string that specifies the formula that will be used to calculate a value for the item.

data.name: ItemCalculatorElement_Engine_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the Infragistics.Calculations.ItemCalculator

data.name: ListCalculatorElement_Engine_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the Infragistics.Calculations.ListCalculator

data.name: ControlCalculationSettings_Binding_Property
data.value: Specifies the binding that will be used to retrieve value from the control or set result of formula calculation on the control.

data.name: ControlCalculationSettings_Formula_Property
data.value: Specifies the formula.

data.name: ControlCalculationSettings_Property_Property
data.value: Identifies the property of the control that will provide the source value for calculations when a formula references this control. If the control is a target of a formula, this property will be set to the result of the formula calculation.

data.name: ControlCalculationSettings_ReferenceId_Property
data.value: Identifies the object. ReferenceId is used to refer to the value of the associated object in other formulas.

data.name: ControlCalculationSettings_ValueConverter_Property
data.value: Specifies the converter to use to convert between the underlying value of the source object to the value that's used in calculations.

data.name: TypeWrapper_Type_Property
data.value: Returns or sets

data.name: TypeWrapper_TypeName_Property
data.value: Returns or sets

data.name: TypeWrapper_TypeResolved_Property
data.value: Returns

data.name: TypeResolver_Type_Property
data.value: Returns or sets

data.name: TypeResolver_TypeName_Property
data.value: Returns or sets

data.name: ControlCalculationSettings_TreatAsTypeName_Property
data.value: Specifies the name of the type to treat the values of the associated object as. For example in the case of a Infragistics.Calculations.ControlCalculationSettings associated to a TextBox, the Text property is string type however you may want to treat it as double when providing the value to the calc engine for formula calculations.

data.name: ControlCalculationSettings_TreatAsTypeResolved_Property
data.value: Determines what type to treat the values of the associated object as (read-only).

data.name: ControlCalculationSettings_TreatAsType_Property
data.value: Specifies what type to treat the values of the associated object as. For example in the case of a Infragistics.Calculations.ControlCalculationSettings associated to a TextBox, the Text property is string type however you may want to treat it as double when providing the value to the calc engine for formula calculations.

data.name: ItemCalculatorElement_Results_Property
data.value: Returns a dictionary containing the results of the calculations (read-only).

data.name: ListCalculator_ListResults_Property
data.value: Returns a dictionary containing the results of the list calculations (read-only).

data.name: ItemCalculator_Results_Property
data.value: Returns a dictionary containing the results of the items calculations (read-only).

data.name: ItemCalculatorElement_Calculator_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the Infragistics.Calculations.ItemCalculator

data.name: ListCalculatorElement_Calculator_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the Infragistics.Calculations.ListCalculator

data.name: CalculatorBase_CalculationManager_Property
data.value: CalculationManager used to perform calculations.

data.name: CalculatorBase_ReferenceId_Property
data.value: Identifies the calculator to the calculation network.

data.name: CalculatorBase_ValueConverter_Property
data.value: Specifies the converter to use to convert between the underlying value of the source item to the value that's used in calculations.

data.name: CalculatorCalculationBase_Formula_Property
data.value: Gets/sets a string that specifies the formula that will be used to calculate a value for the item.

data.name: CalculatorCalculationBase_ReferenceId_Property
data.value: At least ReferenceId or TargetProperty must be specified. If ReferenceId is not specified and TargetProperty is specified, the ReferenceId will be the TargetProperty.

data.name: PropertyValueTracker_CallAsynchronously_Property
data.value: Specifies whether to call the handler asyncrhonously using Dispatcher.BeginInvoke.

data.name: PropertyValueTracker_Tag_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the tag.

data.name: PropertyValueTracker_ThrottleTime_Property
data.value: Throttle time in milliseconds. Default is 0 which means there's no throttling.

data.name: CalculatorBase_PropertiesToExclude_Property
data.value: Identifies properties, in a case-insensitive comma delimited list, of an item to exclude from the calculation network

data.name: CalculatorBase_PropertiesToInclude_Property
data.value: Identifies properties, in a case-insensitive comma delimited list, of an item to expose to the calculation network

data.name: ItemCalculatorBase_CalculationManager_Property
data.value: CalculationManager used to perform calculations.

data.name: ItemCalculatorBase_PropertiesToExclude_Property
data.value: Identifies properties, in a case-insensitive comma delimited list, of an item to exclude from the calculation network

data.name: ItemCalculatorBase_PropertiesToInclude_Property
data.value: Identifies properties, in a case-insensitive comma delimited list, of an item to expose to the calculation network

data.name: ItemCalculatorBase_ReferenceId_Property
data.value: Identifies the calculator to the calculation network.

data.name: ItemCalculatorBase_ValueConverter_Property
data.value: Specifies the converter to use to convert between the underlying value of the source item to the value that's used in calculations.

data.name: ItemCalculatorElementBase_CalculationManager_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the CalculationManager used to perform calculations.

data.name: ItemCalculationBase_Formula_Property
data.value: Gets/sets a string that specifies the formula that will be used to calculate a value for the item.

data.name: ItemCalculationBase_ReferenceId_Property
data.value: At least ReferenceId or TargetProperty must be specified. If ReferenceId is not specified and TargetProperty is specified, the ReferenceId will be the TargetProperty.

data.name: DataAccessErrorEventArgs_Exception_Property
data.value: Returns the exception that was thrown (read-only).

data.name: DataAccessErrorEventArgs_ErrorMessage_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the error message.

data.name: DataAccessErrorEventArgs_Item_Property
data.value: Gets the item that the get or set was attempted for (read-only).

data.name: DataAccessErrorEventArgs_Property_Property
data.value: Returns the name of the property (read-only).

data.name: DataAccessErrorEventArgs_ThrownDuringSet_Property
data.value: Returns whether the exception was thrown during a 'set' operation (read-only).

data.name: DataAccessErrorEventArgs_Value_Property
data.value: Returns the value that was attempting to be set on the property (read-only).

data.name: CalculationResult_ErrorText_Property
data.value: If the result of the calculation is an error, returns the error text. Otherwise returns null.

data.name: CalculationResult_IsError_Property
data.value: Indicates if the result of the calculation is an error.

data.name: ListCalculator_Items_Property
data.value: The collection of items on which calculations will be performed.

data.name: ListCalculator_ItemsSource_Property
data.value: Returns or sets an enumerable used to populate the Infragistics.Calculations.ListCalculator.Items collection

data.name: ListCalculatorElement_ItemsSource_Property
data.value: Returns or sets an enumerable used to populate the Infragistics.Calculations.ListCalculator.Items collection

data.name: CalculationReferenceNode_IsExpanded_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the value indicating whether the node should be expanded if displayed in a tree and it has children.

data.name: CalculationReferenceNode_SortPriority_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the major sort priority for the node within its parent.

data.name: ItemCalculation_TreatAsType_Property
data.value: Specifies what type to treat the values of the associated object as. For example if the Infragistics.Calculations.ItemCalculation.TargetProperty is of type string but it actually contains string representations of date values set this property to System.DateTime.

data.name: ItemCalculation_TreatAsTypeName_Property
data.value: Specifies what type to treat the values of the associated object as. For example if the Infragistics.Calculations.ItemCalculation.TargetProperty is of type string but it actually contains string representations of date values set this property to "datetime" or "datetime?".

data.name: ItemCalculation_TreatAsTypeResolved_Property
data.value: Determines what type to treat the values of the associated object as (read-only).

data.name: XamCalculationManager_AreCalculationsSuspended_Property
data.value: Indicates whether calculations have been suspended via Infragistics.Calculations.XamCalculationManager.SuspendCalculations method.

data.name: CustomCalculationFunctionBase_ArgDescriptors_Property
data.value: Gets descriptions of each argument to the function.

data.name: CustomCalculationFunctionBase_ArgList_Property
data.value: Gets names of each argument to the function.

data.name: CustomCalculationFunctionBase_Category_Property
data.value: Gets the category of the function. Used for formula editor UI to categorize functions.

data.name: CustomCalculationFunctionBase_Description_Property
data.value: Gets the description of the function. Used for formula editor UI.

data.name: CustomCalculationFunctionBase_Name_Property
data.value: Function name used to reference the function in a formula.

data.name: NamedReference_ReferenceId_Property
data.value: Specifies the id of the reference.

data.name: RefBase_ShouldFormulaEditorIncludeIndex_Property
data.value: Gets the value indicating whether the formula editor should include default indexes after this reference's address when enumerable references are used where a single value is expected.

data.name: RefUnAnchored_ShouldFormulaEditorIncludeIndex_Property
data.value: Gets the value indicating whether the formula editor should include default indexes after this reference's address when enumerable references are used where a single value is expected.
